input.sentences: last saturday was our annual christmas festival .
some of the children dressed as animals from the nativity .
we were surprised to see that our organization organization organization brought in live animals to help us celebrate .
it was nice to see several of our friends helping with the music for the [female] sing-a-long .
the bbq was spectacular and enjoyed by all .
output.sentences: The class went on a trip together Saturday night.
They were dressed in coats and some were in animal costumes.
They really enjoyed the petting zoo.
The teacher bought along musical instruments to play.
The demonstrations were the kids' favorite activity.
